attributes.action: Make UK hospitals more environmentally friendly by introdcing recycling stratagies!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hospitals account for a huge ammount of waste so it is supprising that the NHS hasn't already becomme more environmentally friendly. Lets start with the simple things like recyling paper, cardboard and milk bottles and then proceed to look at how we can cut the outgoing cost of the NHS by reducing the ammount we spend on water and electricity etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
